ygData.subject: Re: I'm in the world!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, it does. And yes, I am having fun, and I just realized that I think we re on the same server. I chose Drinal, for no apparent reason, although I think
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks, it does. And yes, I am having fun, and I
just realized that I think we're on the same server. I
chose Drinal, for no apparent reason, although I think
I recognized it from various posts and discussions.
<br><br>Here's a fun one -- someone learned that I was new and
gave me some stuff. One item was a pouch; when I click
on it for a description, it says "Spirit Pouch." I
ran into the giver a bit later and asked her what it
is, and said she'd never heard of a Spirit Pouch . .
. I thought about giving it back in case it's
something really cool, but I _am_ a rogue, you know. Had
she been a dwarf . . . Anyway, any hints on what this
is?
